sentences.en: GOAL # ONE is to a basic understanding of your own horoscope map.
sentences.cn: 目标一 # 对自己(出生)的星图有基本的理解.

sentences.en: Horoscope: You will find love. YES!
sentences.cn: 占星术说: 你会找到爱的! 我相信!

sentences.en: In 12 horoscopes, Leo be the horoscope which have authority and domination ability most.
sentences.cn: 在十二星座中, 狮子座是最具有权威感与支配能力的星座.

sentences.en: Millie is already f with the 12 animal signs of the Chinese horoscope.
sentences.cn: 米莉早已熟悉中国星象中的12个动物生肖.

sentences.en: The house of the horoscope involved rules all sorts of contractual commitments.
sentences.cn: 这个星象的这个宫包涵了支配所有契约承诺的种类.

sentences.en: This aspect is extremely powerful in your horoscope; it will dominate many areas of your life.
sentences.cn: 在你的占星图上,这是个非常有影响力的相位, 将支配你生活中很多领域.

sentences.en: To draw up someone's horoscope, you need to know their date and exact time of birth.
sentences.cn: 要想用星相替人算命, 就得知道他们确切的出生日期和时辰.

sentences.en: We can not judge ourselves or others according to astrology or horoscope chart.
sentences.cn: 我们不能仅仅通过占星或者星象图来判断自己和别人.

sentences.en: Well, for once your horoscope is clearer than most, Virgo.
sentences.cn: 恩, 这次你的星位是最清晰的时刻了, 童贞座.

sentences.en: You as a Virgo probably know what your basic Horoscope is.
sentences.cn: 人出生在这个标志往往知道其基本星座.

trans.tran_en: a description of your character and the things that will happen to you, based on the position of the stars and  planets  at the time of your birth
